name: The 'log_temp_files' database flag for Cloud SQL PostgreSQL instance is set to '0' (on)
query: { cloudSqlInstances( where: { engine: "postgresql" cloudProvider: "gcp" OR: [ { dbFlags_NONE: { name: "log_temp_files" } } { dbFlags_SOME: { name: "log_temp_files", NOT: {value: "0"} } } ] } ) { internalName }}
